entry.title: Retired general reacts to Trump's military comments

media:group.media:title: Retired general reacts to Trump's military comments
media:group.media:description:
Former NATO Supreme Allied Commander Gen. Wesley Clark, speaks to CNN's Jim Sciutto about comments President Donald Trump made regarding the military, where Trump accused them of waging wars to boost the profits of defense manufacturing companies.
#CNN #News

entry.title: 'False!' Brianna Keilar calls out Trump on his lies from past 24 hours

media:group.media:title: 'False!' Brianna Keilar calls out Trump on his lies from past 24 hours
media:group.media:description: CNN's Brianna Keilar fact-checks President Trump's falsehoods from the past 24 hours. #CNN #News

entry.title: 'Just inhuman': Widower denounces Trump's conspiracy theory about his late wife

media:group.media:title: 'Just inhuman': Widower denounces Trump's conspiracy theory about his late wife
media:group.media:description: Widower T.J. Klausutis spoke publicly for the first time on a podcast about the emotional trauma resulting from President Trump continually pushing the conspiracy theory about his wife Lori's 2001 death. #CNN #News

entry.title: Vaccine could be ready for approval in October, CEO says

media:group.media:title: Vaccine could be ready for approval in October, CEO says
media:group.media:description: Ugur Sahin, CEO and co-founder of BioNTech, tells CNN's Fred Pleitgen that the US-German cooperation of Pfizer and BioNTech could have a Covid-19 vaccine ready for regulatory approval by the middle of October. #CNN #News

entry.title: There’s something very unique about the 2020 map

media:group.media:title: There’s something very unique about the 2020 map
media:group.media:description:
The 2020 Presidential election is one of most open fields with more swing states than we’ve seen in any recent election. Chris Cillizza explains why this is and how Trump and Biden are fighting to claim those states.
SOURCES AND FURTHER READING: This is the widest presidential battleground in a very long time https://www.cnn.com/2020/08/31/politics/2020-race-donald-trump-joe-biden-swing-states/index.html
Pelosi Warns Democrats: Stay in the Center or Trump May Contest Election Results https://www.nytimes.com/2019/05/04/us/politics/nancy-pelosi.html
270toWin: Minnesota https://www.270towin.com/states/Minnesota
Can Donald Trump change the electoral map, again? https://www.cnn.com/2019/09/16/politics/donald-trump-2020-electoral-map-new-mexico/index.html
2020 Election: Joe Biden https://www.cnn.com/election/2020/candidate/biden
About me: I was named "best dressed" in 7th grade. That, along with being CNN's editor at large and author of the daily "Point" newsletter are my proudest achievements. Look for me here every Tuesday and Thursday to find out what’s really going down in politics.
CREDITS Writer: Chris Cillizza The Point team: Leigh Munsil and Allison Gordon Editor: Michelle Cho Producer: Arielle Sacks
Follow Chris on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cillizzac/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/cillizzacnn Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/chris.cillizza/ Subscribe to The Point newsletter: https://www.cnn.com/specials/politics/the-point-with-chris-cillizza?source=Point_Youtube.
#CNN #Cillizza #SwingStates

entry.title: Trump tells reporter to take mask off during briefing

media:group.media:title: Trump tells reporter to take mask off during briefing
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Erica Hill calls out President Trump's messaging on masks after he told a reporter to take off a mask during a White House press briefing.
#CNN #News

entry.title: 'Foul mood today': Borger calls out Trump's attitude at news conference

media:group.media:title: 'Foul mood today': Borger calls out Trump's attitude at news conference
media:group.media:description:
CNN's Brooke Baldwin, Gloria Borger, Abby Phillip and Jim Acosta fact check President Trump's Labor Day news conference.
#CNN #News

entry.title: Why Nebraska could be a deciding factor in November

media:group.media:title: Why Nebraska could be a deciding factor in November
media:group.media:description: CNN senior politics writer and analyst Harry Enten breaks down electoral college votes ahead of the 2020 presidential election and points out why Nebraska might be the deciding factor. #CNN #News

entry.title: Schiff: Barr flat-out misled with a 'blatantly false statement'

media:group.media:title: Schiff: Barr flat-out misled with a 'blatantly false statement'
media:group.media:description: Chairman of the House Intelligence Committee Rep. Adam Schiff (D-CA) says Attorney General William Barr's claim, that China is a bigger threat to election security than Russia is a "blatantly false statement." #CNN #News

entry.title: Andrew Yang says he would work in Biden, Harris WH

media:group.media:title: Andrew Yang says he would work in Biden, Harris WH
media:group.media:description: CNN's Ana Cabrera discusses the likelihood of a coronavirus stimulus bill with former 2020 Democratic presidential candidate Andrew Yang, and a potential job for Yang as labor secretary under a Joe Biden administration. #CNN #News

entry.title: White House on defense against barrage of tell-all books

media:group.media:title: White House on defense against barrage of tell-all books
media:group.media:description: CNN’s Ana Cabrera discusses the onslaught of tell-all books coming out only 58 days before the presidential election, and how they have put the Trump White House on the defensive. #CNN #News

entry.title: Fox News contradicts its own reporting on Trump comments

media:group.media:title: Fox News contradicts its own reporting on Trump comments
media:group.media:description: A controversial report in The Atlantic that said President Donald Trump disparaged US military members who died in service later had key details confirmed by other news outlets, including Fox News. Hours after network correspondent Jennifer Griffin confirmed portions of the story, Fox News host Greg Gutfeld contradicted her reporting by calling the news "a hoax."

entry.title: Kamala Harris visits Howard University, her alma mater, with CNN

media:group.media:title: Kamala Harris visits Howard University, her alma mater, with CNN
media:group.media:description: Democratic vice presidential nominee Sen. Kamala Harris discusses her family and college experience with CNN's Dana Bash.

entry.title: Kamala Harris' exclusive interview with CNN (part 2)

media:group.media:title: Kamala Harris' exclusive interview with CNN (part 2)
media:group.media:description: Democratic vice presidential nominee Sen. Kamala Harris sat down with CNN's Dana Bash to discuss race in America, voter suppression and other topics. Watch the first part of the exclusive interview here: https://cnn.it/3i5uMEA

entry.title: CNN Exclusive interview with Sen. Kamala Harris (part 1)

media:group.media:title: CNN Exclusive interview with Sen. Kamala Harris (part 1)
media:group.media:description: Democratic vice presidential nominee Sen. Kamala Harris talks about President Trump's response to the coronavirus pandemic and the protests in Kenosha, Wisconsin, with CNN's Dana Bash. Watch the second part of the exclusive interview here: https://cnn.it/2FaVFsd
